title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-1.41 - Reservice of unused potentially hazardous food and unused, unprotected food prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-1.41 - Reservice of unused potentially hazardous food and unused, unprotected food prohibited

State Regulations
(a) Unused potentially hazardous food which has been served may not be served again. (b) Unused, unprotected food which has been served may not be served again. (c) Food is considered served when it has been offered without protection to the consumer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
14-1.41

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
